## Loading libraries

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE }
library(flexFitR)
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
library(ggpubr)
library(purrr)
```

## Exploring data `explorer()`

```{r}
data(dt_potato)
explorer <- explorer(dt_potato, x = DAP, y = Canopy, id = Plot)
```

```{r}
names(explorer)
```

## Data exploration

```{r, fig.width= 8, fig.height=4, fig.alt="plot corr"}
p1 <- plot(explorer, type = "evolution", return_gg = TRUE)
p2 <- plot(explorer, type = "x_by_var", return_gg = TRUE)
ggarrange(p1, p2)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
kable(mutate_if(explorer$summ_vars, is.numeric, round, 2))
```


## Target Function 

`fn_piwise()`

\begin{equation}
f(t; t_1, t_2, k) =
\begin{cases}
0 & \text{if } t < t_1 \\
\dfrac{k}{t_2 - t_1} \cdot (t - t_1) & \text{if } t_1 \leq t \leq t_2 \\
k & \text{if } t > t_2
\end{cases}
\end{equation}


```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.width= 8, fig.alt="plot fn"}
plot_fn(
  fn = "fn_piwise",
  params = c(t1 = 34.9, t2 = 61.8, k = 100),
  interval = c(0, 108),
  color = "black",
  base_size = 15
)
```

## Fitting Models

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE }
mod_1 <- dt_potato |>
  modeler(
    x = DAP,
    y = Canopy,
    grp = Plot,
    fn = "fn_piwise",
    parameters = c(t1 = 45, t2 = 80, k = 0.9),
    subset = c(195, 40),
    options = list(add_zero = TRUE)
  )
mod_1
```


```{r, fig.width= 8, fig.height=4, fig.alt="plot fit"}
plot(mod_1, id = c(195, 40))
kable(mod_1$param)
```

## Providing different initial values

```{r}
initials <- data.frame(
  uid = c(195, 40),
  t1 = c(70, 60),
  t2 = c(40, 80),
  k = c(100, 100)
)
```

```{r}
kable(initials)
```

```{r}
mod_2 <- dt_potato |>
  modeler(
    x = DAP,
    y = Canopy,
    grp = Plot,
    fn = "fn_piwise",
    parameters = initials,
    subset = c(195, 40),
    options = list(add_zero = TRUE)
  )
```

```{r, fig.width= 8, fig.height=4, fig.alt="plot fit 2"}
plot(mod_2, id = c(195, 40))
kable(mod_2$param)
```

## Fixing some parameters of the model

```{r}
fixed_params <- data.frame(uid = c(195, 40), k = c(100, 100))
```

```{r}
kable(fixed_params)
```


```{r}
mod_3 <- dt_potato |>
  modeler(
    x = DAP,
    y = Canopy,
    grp = Plot,
    fn = "fn_piwise",
    parameters = c(t1 = 45, t2 = 80, k = 0.9),
    fixed_params = fixed_params,
    subset = c(195, 40),
    options = list(add_zero = TRUE)
  )
```

```{r, fig.width= 8, fig.height=4, fig.alt="plot fit 3"}
plot(mod_3, id = c(195, 40))
kable(mod_3$param)
```

## Correcting Maximun value

```{r}
mod_4 <- dt_potato |>
  modeler(
    x = DAP,
    y = Canopy,
    grp = Plot,
    fn = "fn_piwise",
    parameters = c(t1 = 45, t2 = 80, k = 0.9),
    fixed_params = fixed_params,
    subset = c(195, 40),
    options = list(add_zero = TRUE, max_as_last = TRUE)
  )
```

```{r, fig.width= 8, fig.height=4, fig.alt="plot fit 4"}
plot(mod_4, id = c(195, 40))
kable(mod_4$param)
```

## Comparing Models

```{r}
rbind.data.frame(
  mutate(mod_1$param, model = "1", .before = uid),
  mutate(mod_2$param, model = "2", .before = uid),
  mutate(mod_3$param, model = "3", .before = uid),
  mutate(mod_4$param, model = "4", .before = uid)
) |>
  filter(uid %in% 195) |>
  kable()
```
